item.title: Server-Sent Events with Nuxt.js (Vue.js) and Nginx proxy
item.description: Suppose you have a Nuxt.js (Vue.js) application which calls a backend and which is behind a Nginx reverse proxy. If your backend stream Server-Sent Events (SSE) using text/event-stream content-type, you may have these errors: 504 (Gateway Time-out) or ERR_INCOMPLETE_CHUNKED_ENCODING (in Chrome).
